CustomField.description:
Lifetime Total Gift Count / (Last Giving Year - Fist Giving Year)
POINTS AWARDED: 100% = 10 pts 90-99% = 8 pts 80-89% = 6 pts 70-79% = 4 pts 60-69% = 2 pts <60% = 1 pt
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Lifetime Total Gift Count / (Last Giving Year - Fist Giving Year)
POINTS AWARDED: 100% = 10 pts 90-99% = 8 pts 80-89% = 6 pts 70-79% = 4 pts 60-69% = 2 pts <60% = 1 pt
CustomField.label: Giving Frequency
